artist: Delineator: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Guiseppe Asioli; Painter: After Ludovico Carracci
description: Blessed Virgin crowned with stars and standing on crescent moon holding child Jesus with saints Francis and Jerome, holding a book, at her feet; angels with musical instruments around her; lion head lower left corner
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

In plate in black: [ L. Carracci dip.   F.Rosaspina dis  G. Asioli inc. /LA BEATA VERGINE CON GESU BAMBINO IN GLORIA/ E LI S.S. GIROLAMO E FRANCESCO]
title: La Beata Vergine con Gesú Bambino in Gloria/ e li S.S. Girolamo e Francesco
